empire-state-infographic.png.description: An infographic using images of the Empire State Building to illustrate reduced carbon footprint over time

bratz-infographic.png.description: An infographic using concentric circles to illustrate the neck/head ratio of people vs. Bratz dolls

mass-shooting-infographic.png.description: An infographic using images of assault rifles to illustrate mass shottings

dollar-infographic-mona-chalabi.png.caption: Made by Data Designer @link{https://www.instagram.com/monachalabi/, Mona Chalabi}
dollar-infographic-mona-chalabi.png.description: Infographic: For every dollar a white man earns... visual shows parts of dollar bills corresponding to the comparable earning of other groups including (from highest to lowest earnings): Asian Men, Asian Women, White Women, Black Men, Native American Men, Black Women, Hispanic Men, Native American Women, Hispanic Women
dollar-infographic-mona-chalabi.png.license: Used with permission from the creator.

space-in-am-mona-chalabi.png.description: Infographic: Space in America. visual shows a 10x20 rectangle titled _average parking space_ and a 7 x 11 rectangle titled _average solitary confinement cell_
space-in-am-mona-chalabi.png.license: Used with permission from the creator
